usa: Scopes Trial: High school teacher John T. Scopes was found guilty of violating Tennessee's Butler Act, for teaching human evolution in the classroom.[101]
Nellie Tayloe Ross was elected Governor of Wyoming, becoming the first woman elected governor of a U.S. State.<sup id="cite_ref-102" class="reference">[102]</sup>
WSM first broadcast the Grand Ole Opry.<sup id="cite_ref-103" class="reference">[103]</sup>
